question_text: Which of the following are true of DOCSIS-based cable networks? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They support high-speed internet and television
They are limited to 10 Mbps downstream
correct_answer: They support high-speed internet and television
explanation: DOCSIS networks use coaxial cables and broadband to support data, TV, and voice. They can offer speeds far exceeding 10 Mbps.
